name: GitHub Dark by Bane
description:
GitHub. Dark.
Others I've seen were sorta broken. This one shouldn't be, for a while anyway
additional_info:
Release!
- Dark!

Update 1:
- Missed some stuff, added
- Changed the colour scheme to one that, well, let's say should be more familiar

Update 2:
- Some icons were fixed to fit the theme
- Minor Github Docs changes
- Some BG elements were strange, so I fixed them

Update 3:
- Minor changes on GitHub's end led to minor changes her
- Activity heatmap view now updated again
- Issue comment box now updated again
- Minor icon changes
- Code Additions/Subtractions now styled
